title: Did Donald Trump Admit Criminal Wrongdoing, Argue ‘My Crimes Can’t Be Investigated While I’m President’?
subtitle: A misleading summary of a legal argument made by the president's lawyers was converted into a direct quotation.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: As part of a federal lawsuit, U.S. President Donald Trump admitted criminal wrongdoing and said or argued to the effect that "My crimes can't be investigated while I'm president."
